title: Simple circuits - battery and 2 Rs open circuit

content.prompt: The figure shows a battery connected to two resistors. Is there current in the resistors? What evidence or reasoning supports the claim?

choices.label: Yes. The two resistors form a closed electrical loop, which is required for charge to flow.
Yes. The resistors are connected to the battery, which supplies charge that can flow to the resistors.
No. The two resistors form only one closed electrical loop, and at least two closed loops are required for charge to flow.
No. The battery is not part of a closed electrical loop, and cannot supply a potential difference across either of the resistors.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
